Title: Enacts "Melanie's law"
Summary: Enacts "Melanie's law"; relates to orders of protection; allows courts to issue orders of protection for immediate family members or household members of the named victims, regardless of age.
LawCode: Amd ยง812, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง530.11, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the criminal procedure law, in relation to orders of protection
